title: Jeremy Hunt – 2019 Speech on Britain’s Role in a Post-Brexit World
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Jeremy Hunt, the Foreign Secretary, at the International Institute for Strategic Studies in Singapore, on 2 January 2019.
